experience.title: Product Consultant
experience.description: Enhanced app rating from 2.4 to 3.8 and decreased user issues by 21% through prioritized pain point resolution strategies.Reduced overall user resolution time by 2 hours via streamlined support processes leveraging Salesforce optimization.Innovated a new class and test scheduling system, minimizing manual efforts and errors for operational teams.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: â€¢ Responsible for leading the apex body consisting of 22 Core Organising Team members, 40 Associates.â€¢ Spearheading more than 100 fest time events, along with the nationwide prelims of 10 events across 20 cities in India â€¢ Solely responsible for formulation, planning & execution of Dance, Food-Fest genres of the fest â€¢ Handling the creative online events of the fest through various existing social media platforms catering to 200,000+ followers.â€¢Collaborated with leading media houses and managed to get Spring Fest featured in 200 media articles and 20 online media Partners.â€¢Coordinated a 30member, three-tier design, and media team, responsible for the design and content development to promote the fest.â€¢Spearheaded Spring Fest Social Initiative Virasat to promote different cultures of India.
positions.title: Events Head , Media and Public Relations Head and Design Coordinator
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Responsible for leading the apex body consisting of 22 Core Organising Team members, 40 Associates.
â€¢ Spearheading more than 100 fest time events, along with the nationwide prelims of 10 events across 20 cities in India
â€¢ Solely responsible for formulation, planning & execution of Dance, Food-Fest genres of the fest
â€¢ Handling the creative online events of the fest through various existing social media platforms catering to 200,000+ followers.
â€¢Collaborated with leading media houses and managed to get Spring Fest featured in 200 media articles and 20 online media Partners.
â€¢Coordinated a 30member, three-tier design, and media team, responsible for the design and content development to promote the fest.
â€¢Spearheaded Spring Fest Social Initiative Virasat to promote different cultures of India.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: Core Organising Team MemberDates EmployedAug 2019 â€“ Aug 2020Employment Duration12 mosLocationKharagpur Area, Indiaâ€¢ Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.74 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contributionâ€¢ Single-handedly organized a complete Nukkad, KTM Stunt Show, Salsa.â€¢ Co-led a team of 35 Associate Members, responsible for effective publicity in over 700+ colleges across the country, and publication of articles in different regional and national newspapers and magazines in Indiaâ€¢ Achieved a 78% YoY increase in participation from Maharashtra by publicizing the fest extensively in over 100+ collegesâ€¢ Conducted single-handed the nationwide prelims First time ever of 5 events in Nagpur achieving 300+ participation.â€¢ Conducted the Eliminations First time ever in Raipur,  which includes Poetry slam and Hilarity ensues achieving 100+ participantsâ€¢ Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland
positions.title: Core organising team member of spring fest
positions.description_html:
Core Organising Team Member
Dates EmployedAug 2019 â€“ Aug 2020
Employment Duration12 mos
LocationKharagpur Area, India
â€¢ Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.74 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contribution
â€¢ Single-handedly organized a complete Nukkad, KTM Stunt Show, Salsa.
â€¢ Co-led a team of 35 Associate Members, responsible for effective publicity in over 700+ colleges across the country, and publication of articles in different regional and national newspapers and magazines in India
â€¢ Achieved a 78% YoY increase in participation from Maharashtra by publicizing the fest extensively in over 100+ colleges
â€¢ Conducted single-handed the nationwide prelims First time ever of 5 events in Nagpur achieving 300+ participation.
â€¢ Conducted the Eliminations First time ever in Raipur, which includes Poetry slam and Hilarity ensues achieving 100+ participants
â€¢ Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland
